Name: Kingdom Quest
About the game: Kingdom Quest is a management game where you will need to create and collect the resources to develop your kingdom and raise an army to send out on quests for fame and fortune. You must decide how to grow your kingdom. Should you build a tavern first so you can find and swap quests? Maybe you should focus on your Guilds so you can build more robust armies that can tackle any quest.
